sense.gloss: person bearing responsibility, person in charge, supporter

sdata.j: 「↑何↑↓な|に↓↑泣↑↓な↓いて|んの？ ↑僕↑↓ぼく↓↑何↑↓なん↓か↑悪↑↓わる↓いこと↑言↑↓い↓った？」「↑違↑↓ちが↓う、↑汗↑↓あせ↓が↑目↑↓め↓に↑入↑↓はい↓っただけ」
sdata.e: Why are you crying? Did I say something I shouldn't have? "No, it's just that a drop of sweat got into my eye."

sdata.j: ↑何↑↓な|に↓↑泣↑↓な↓いて|んの？ ↑気持↑↓きも↓ち↑悪↑↓わる↓い。
sdata.e: Why are you crying? That's disgusting.

sdata.j: ↑木↑↓き↓の↑上↑↓うえ↓で↑鳥↑↓とり↓が↑楽↑↓たの↓しそう|に↑鳴↑↓な↓いて|いる。
sdata.e: A bird is singing in the tree.
